page.title: 10A Daily Routine.
page.content: {Lifestyles in Yeovil are varied This page shows a day in my life. I am eleven years old. The first thing I do in a day is have breakfast. I usually have toast and a cup of tea. Then I get ready for school and off I go. It usually takes me a quarter of an hour to walk to school from where I live. Once we get to school the bell goes and we go in for lessons. Then when its playtime I just run around with my friends. In the afternoon when the bell goes for hometime,I pack up and walk home. When I get home I have a drink and sit down,then I get changed and go out to play. At eight o'clock I come in and watch television,then go to bed early for school in the morning. When I go to bed I read until I'm tired enough to go to sleep.
